thread.title: Salman and Partner Govinda’s camaraderie on the sets of Bigg Boss 10 is heart-warming!
thread.title_full: Salman and Partner Govinda’s camaraderie on the sets of Bigg Boss 10 is heart-warming!

author: Bulbul Sharma
title: Salman and Partner Govinda’s camaraderie on the sets of Bigg Boss 10 is heart-warming!
text:
January 13, 2017 Bulbul Sharma 5533 reads 0 comments 
Salman and Govinda, needless to say, create magic on-screen. And almost after a decade the duo is all set to bring back their camaraderie from Partner and will soon be seen sharing the screen again. 
The 53-year-old actor today shot for Bigg Boss 10 with host and dost Salman and here’s a sneak peek from the fun-filled episode. 
Salman took to Twitter to post a pic of himself from the sets with Govinda and captioned it as “Shooting with Partner @Govinda_HeroNo1.” 
Earlier, Govinda also took to social media and wrote “On my way to the Bigg Boss house! How excited are you? #BiggBoss10 #Aa Gaya Hero.” 
Excited much? 
Notably, Govinda was on the show to promote his upcoming next- Aa Gaya Hero . On my way to the Bigg Boss house! How excited are you? #BiggBoss10 #AaGayaHero pic.twitter.com/BPrZAFWppb
